metadata.title: RHSA-2020:3090: Red Hat OpenShift Service Mesh 1.1 servicemesh-proxy security update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
Red Hat OpenShift Service Mesh is Red Hat's distribution of the Istio service mesh project, tailored for installation into an on-premise OpenShift Container Platform installation.

Security Fix(es):

* envoyproxy/envoy: incorrectly validates TLS certificates when using wildcards for DNS SAN's (CVE-2020-15104)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2020-15104 envoyproxy/envoy: incorrectly validates TLS certificates when using wildcards for DNS SAN's

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
servicemesh-proxy is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
